languages.text: "Меня отдали в распоряжение ведьминского культа — владельцев арены. Сначала заставили сражаться с отребьем, потом, насладившись моим унижением, позволили войти в круг Кровавых прозелитов".

traits.locale_text: "Меня отдали в распоряжение ведьминского культа — владельцев арены. Сначала заставили сражаться с отребьем, потом, насладившись моим унижением, позволили войти в круг Кровавых прозелитов".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "I was handed over to the Wych Cult to do with as they wished. First they made me fight the dregs in the arena, and then, once they had had their fill of my debasement, I was granted entry into the Bloodstained Proselytes."
languages.original_text: "Меня отдали в распоряжение ведьминского культа — владельцев арены. Сначала заставили сражаться с отребьем, потом, насладившись моим унижением, позволили войти в круг Кровавых прозелитов".

traits.locale_text: "I was handed over to the Wych Cult to do with as they wished. First they made me fight the dregs in the arena, and then, once they had had their fill of my debasement, I was granted entry into the Bloodstained Proselytes."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was handed over to the Wych Cult to do with as they wished. First they made me fight the dregs in the arena, and then, once they had had their fill of my debasement, I was granted entry into the Bloodstained Proselytes."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was handed over to the Wych Cult to do with as they wished. First they made me fight the dregs in the arena, and then, once they had had their fill of my debasement, I was granted entry into the Bloodstained Proselytes."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was handed over to the Wych Cult to do with as they wished. First they made me fight the dregs in the arena, and then, once they had had their fill of my debasement, I was granted entry into the Bloodstained Proselytes."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Me entregaron al Culto de Brujas para que hicieran conmigo lo que quisieran. Primero me hicieron luchar contra los despojos de la arena, y cuando saciaron su sed de degradación, me permitieron ingresar en los Prosélitos Ensangrentados».
languages.original_text: "I was handed over to the Wych Cult to do with as they wished. First they made me fight the dregs in the arena, and then, once they had had their fill of my debasement, I was granted entry into the Bloodstained Proselytes."

traits.locale_text: «Me entregaron al Culto de Brujas para que hicieran conmigo lo que quisieran. Primero me hicieron luchar contra los despojos de la arena, y cuando saciaron su sed de degradación, me permitieron ingresar en los Prosélitos Ensangrentados».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “我被交给了巫灵教派，任由他们处置。他们先是让我在竞技场上和那些渣滓搏斗。等到我受尽屈辱之后，他们又让我加入了血腥叛党。”
languages.original_text: "I was handed over to the Wych Cult to do with as they wished. First they made me fight the dregs in the arena, and then, once they had had their fill of my debasement, I was granted entry into the Bloodstained Proselytes."

traits.locale_text: “我被交给了巫灵教派，任由他们处置。他们先是让我在竞技场上和那些渣滓搏斗。等到我受尽屈辱之后，他们又让我加入了血腥叛党。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「俺は魔女団に引き渡され、奴等の思うがままにさせられた。最初は闘技場のクズどもと戦わされ、品位もクソもなくなった俺を見て満足したら、今度は血まみれの改宗者に入ることを許された」
languages.original_text: "I was handed over to the Wych Cult to do with as they wished. First they made me fight the dregs in the arena, and then, once they had had their fill of my debasement, I was granted entry into the Bloodstained Proselytes."

traits.locale_text: 「俺は魔女団に引き渡され、奴等の思うがままにさせられた。最初は闘技場のクズどもと戦わされ、品位もクソもなくなった俺を見て満足したら、今度は血まみれの改宗者に入ることを許された」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « On m'a remis aux mains du Culte Céraste. Elles ont commencé par me jeter dans l'arène pour affronter ce ramassis de gredins, et quand elles ont jugé que je m'étais suffisamment avili, elles m'ont proposé d'intégrer les rangs des Prosélytes sanglants. »
languages.original_text: "I was handed over to the Wych Cult to do with as they wished. First they made me fight the dregs in the arena, and then, once they had had their fill of my debasement, I was granted entry into the Bloodstained Proselytes."

traits.locale_text: « On m'a remis aux mains du Culte Céraste. Elles ont commencé par me jeter dans l'arène pour affronter ce ramassis de gredins, et quand elles ont jugé que je m'étais suffisamment avili, elles m'ont proposé d'intégrer les rangs des Prosélytes Sanglants. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ich wurde dem Hekatarii-Kult übergeben, damit sie mit mir tun, was immer sie wollen. Zuerst haben sie mich in der Arena gegen den Abschaum kämpfen lassen, und als sie dann genug davon hatten, mich zu erniedrigen, wurde mir Zugang zu den Blutbefleckten Proselyten gewährt."
languages.original_text: "I was handed over to the Wych Cult to do with as they wished. First they made me fight the dregs in the arena, and then, once they had had their fill of my debasement, I was granted entry into the Bloodstained Proselytes."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wurde dem Hekatarii-Kult übergeben, damit sie mit mir tun, was immer sie wollen. Zuerst haben sie mich in der Arena gegen den Abschaum kämpfen lassen, und als sie dann genug davon hatten, mich zu erniedrigen, wurde mir Zugang zu den Blutbefleckten Proselyten gewährt."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "I was handed over to the Wych Cult to do with as they wished. First they made me fight the dregs in the arena, and then, once they had had their fill of my debasement, I was granted entry into the Bloodstained Proselytes."

languages.text: "Ne isterlerse yapsınlar diye Viç Tarikatı'na teslim edildim. Önce arenada sefillerle savaştırdılar. Beni aşağılamaya doyduktan sonra da Kızıl Zındıklar'dan olma hakkı tanıdılar."
languages.original_text: "I was handed over to the Wych Cult to do with as they wished. First they made me fight the dregs in the arena, and then, once they had had their fill of my debasement, I was granted entry into the Bloodstained Proselytes."

traits.locale_text: "Ne isterlerse yapsınlar diye Viç Tarikatı'na teslim edildim. Önce arenada sefillerle savaştırdılar. Beni aşağılamaya doyduktan sonra da Kızıl Zındıklar'dan olma hakkı tanıdılar."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
